event_msg:
DogpatchJS is tonight (6:30pm) @ Spark Social.
 Tasty street food w/ friends!
 All are welcome.
 Talk, learn, and hack.
 DM me an emoji to RSVP.
reminder_msg: DogpatchJS is coming up! Monday, September 4th at Spark Social
cancel_msg: We're skipping DogpatchJS tonight since fewer than 4 people RSVP'd.
huh_dm_msg: 🤔 please send an emoji if you'd like to RSVP!
ok_dm_msg: 🎉 see you there! (send me "nvm" if you change your mind)
